TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed StickyNoteControl extends System.Windows.Controls.Control
Public NotInheritable Class StickyNoteControl Inherits Control
public ref class StickyNoteControl sealed : System::Windows::Controls::Control

summary.span: 表示一个控件，该控件允许用户在文档中附加键入的文本或手写的批注。

span.span: Represents a control that lets users attach typed text or handwritten annotations to documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 手写便笺提供其内容是独立于文本、 图像或其他材料注意定位到的矩形区域。A sticky note provides a rectangular area whose content is separate from the text, image, or other material to which the note is anchored. 类及其成员都是公开的以便它可以设置样式，但没有公共构造函数。The class and its members are public so that it can be styled, but is no public constructor. 与创建实例和的类。Instances are created with the and of the class. 手写便笺创建时，它被指定为两种类型之一：When a sticky note is created, it is designated as one of two types: - **文本**粘滞便笺有内容可以编写和编辑任何其他格式文本区域等区域。**Text** sticky notes have a content area that can be written and edited like any other Rich Text area. 用户可以在其中键入和还可以剪切、 复制和粘贴注意内部和之间注意和其他应用程序。Users can type into it and can also cut, copy, and paste both within the note and between the note and other applications. 此外可将图像粘贴到注释中。Images can also be pasted into the note. 常见的多格式文本键盘快捷方式，还提供。The usual Rich Text keyboard shortcuts are also available. - **墨迹**粘滞便笺有内容可编辑区域和它，如其他墨迹 canvasses。**Ink** sticky notes have an content area and it can be edited like other ink canvasses. 例如，可以擦除笔划。For example, strokes can be erased. 平板电脑或其他合适的硬件，用户可以输入手写的便笺。With a tablet PC or other suitable hardware, users can enter handwritten notes. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的使它成为更强大的方法添加批注比标记硬拷贝或使用物理手写的便笺的材料。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] of the makes it a more powerful way to annotate material than marking up a hardcopy or using physical handwritten notes. 它也是比只需将添加到，或通过文档的文本中深刻更灵活。It is also more flexible than simply adding to, or striking through, the text of a document. - 可以调整大小粘滞便笺。Sticky notes can be resized. - 可以最小化到一个图标和展开粘滞便笺。Sticky notes can be minimized to an icon and expanded. - 最大化时，手写便笺可以拖动到窗口中的新位置而不更改其定位点的位置。When maximized, a sticky note can be dragged to a new position in a window without changing the location of its anchor. - 应用手写便笺的确切内容是突出显示，并用括号标出。The exact content to which a sticky note applies is highlighted and marked off with brackets. - 两个或多个粘滞便笺可以应用到相同的内容或重叠的内容。Two or more sticky notes can apply to the same content or to overlapping content. - 当手写便笺定位到的文档内容发生变化时，手写便笺的位置将在相对于绑定到的内容的位置。When change occurs within the document content to which a sticky note is anchored, the sticky note's position moves in position relative to the content to which it was bound. - 使用文本手写便笺，将自动换行。With text sticky notes, lines will wrap automatically. 如果注释的大小调整，根据需要将重新换行。If the note is resized, lines will re-wrap as needed. 如果内容延伸以下注释的底部，将显示垂直滚动条。If content extends below the bottom of the note, a vertical scroll bar will appear. - 使用墨迹手写便笺内容超出其中值得注意的边界时，将显示垂直和水平滚动条。With ink sticky notes, vertical and horizontal scroll bars will appear whenever content extends beyond the boundaries of the note. ## Examples 下面的示例演示菜单中的命令可以配置为执行和的类。The following example shows how menu commands in a can be configured to execute the and of the class. 该示例演示如何读取[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)]文档到控制，然后启用支持将添加用户创建粘滞便笺。The example shows how to read an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] document into a control and then enable support for adding user-created sticky notes. [!code-xaml[DocViewerAnnotationsXps#CreateDeleteAnnotations](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DocViewerAnnotationsXps/CSharp/Window1.xaml#createdeleteannotations)]

span.span: An object that provides information about the annotated object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您以匹配手写便笺与相应的带批注对象。This property enables you to match the sticky note with the corresponding annotated object. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 表示一个命令，该命令的 方法将墨迹手写便笺中的光标切换到几种可能的模式之一，包括绘制和擦除。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用时，采用类型的参数。When used, the takes a parameter of type . 该命令方法会将光标置于由参数指定的模式。The command's method will put the cursor in the mode specified by the parameter.
